function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on disinfection using chlorine-containing substances","Impact":"Exposure to high levels of chlorine can have harmful health effects on individuals","Mitigation":"Use of alternative disinfection methods to reduce reliance on chlorine-based substances","Technologies":"UV disinfection and other non-chlorine-based disinfectants","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, and individuals in indoor facilities","Owner":"Healthcare facilities and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate evaluation of drug therapies for COVID-19","Impact":"Use of ineffective or harmful drugs to treat COVID-19 patients","Mitigation":"Thorough clinical trials and evaluation of drug therapies before widespread use","Technologies":"Clinical trial protocols and evidence-based evaluations","People":"COVID-19 patients, healthcare providers, and researchers","Owner":"Pharmaceutical companies, research institutions, and regulatory authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate evaluation of traditional medicinal plants for COVID-19 treatment","Impact":"Potential ineffective or harmful use of traditional medicinal plants for COVID-19 treatment","Mitigation":"Thorough scientific evaluation and clinical trials before recommending traditional plants for COVID-19 treatment","Technologies":"Clinical trial protocols and scientific research methods","People":"Individuals seeking alternative treatments for COVID-19","Owner":"Health authorities and research institutions"}]}
